# Clanmind
## Overview
You have a strong, almost supernatural bond with your fellow [[Dweorg|dweorg]].

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *[[Dweorg]] or must have been born and raised to adulthood among the [[Dweorg|dweorg]].*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- You gain a +1 bonus to AC while a friendly [[Dweorg|dweorg]] is within 5 ft. of you.
- You gain a bonus action to aid all friendly [[Dweorg|dweorg]] attacking creatures within 5 feet of you. If the ally attacks the target before your next turn, the first attack roll the [[Dweorg|dweorg]] ally makes is made with advantage.
- You may use your action to allow a friendly [[Dweorg|dweorg]] within 5 ft. of you to take the disengage action as a bonus action on their next turn.
